chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini is experiencing the following issue:

The phone's casing displays numerous visible signs of wear.

Thank you for your help,


Once the package is received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or household appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, they have 2 business days to process a refund (if you're eligible).

A return is considered complete when the customer has met all the following conditions:

✔ Confirms that the product has not been repaired by a third party, and has not suffered any damage due to a fall or exposure to water.
✔ Confirms that personal data has been erased.
✔ Has confirmed having the return label.
✔ Understands they must include accessories as well as a proof of purchase in their package.
✔ Understands they have 14 days to use the return label.

Reminder: Once received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or household appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, they have 2 business days to process a refund (if you're eligible).

Hello ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder, as we noticed that you received a package for a return under warranty more than 3 business days ago on 03/06/2024. We remind you that the intervention time (return of a product or refund) is 3 business days in the case of a technical problem.

Please provide us with the tracking number of the repaired/replaced product within the next 24 business hours, otherwise we will have to proceed with the refund in accordance with the Back Market charter.

Thank you in advance for your help,

Eliane from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
JY
